dmca.title: Breach of copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: webmaster@prestonswebhosting.com
[mailto:webmaster@prestonswebhosting.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, September 28, 2006 5:43 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Breach of copyright.
Subject: Breach of copyright.


Hello,
 
Please could you provide some help to resolving an issue that I have.
 
I sold the following domains about a week ago and they are hosted on
your system under the following nameservers:
NS1.PINGW1.NET, NS2.PINGW1.NET
 
The problem that I have is that these domains was sold without any
content and as you can see the new owner has copied our website and is
using our own business contact details and even displays our own clients
website screenshots and testimonials.
 
Please could you arrange for the content of these websites to be deleted
as it is a blatant breach of copyright theft.
 
The domains in question are:
http://www.designedfx-webdesign.com/
<http://www.designedfx-webdesign.com/> 
http://www.irish-web-hosts.info/ <http://www.irish-web-hosts.info/> 
http://www.mr-webhosting.com/ <http://www.mr-webhosting.com/> 
http://www.thswebhosting.com/ <http://www.thswebhosting.com/> 
http://www.web-hosting-web-design.com/
<http://www.web-hosting-web-design.com/> 
 
I have been informed that the person that bought then from myself
(ya@bobych.ru <mailto:ya@bobych.ru>  - Roman O Babtchinski) was acting
as a broker for:
 
Gvido Shmel
Monetchikov per
Moscow
Russia
119322
Shmel.0@gmail.com <mailto:Shmel.0@gmail.com> 

I am not interested in taking legal action, I just want the content of
these websites deleted. I have also informed both of the above parties
of this issue.
 
Regards,
Mark Preston
Managing Director
Preston's Web Hosting
www.prestonswebhosting.com <http://www.prestonswebhosting.com> 
webmaster@prestonswebhosting.com
